title: Ski Jumping Is A High School Sport In N.H.
teaser: When it comes to winter sports in high school, New Hampshire athletes stand alone — in some high places.
contentencoded:
When it comes to winter sports in high school, New Hampshire athletes stand alone — in some high places. It’s the only state in the country where students still compete in ski jumping, a sport kids learn in ski jumping clubs.

Charlotte Albright from Here & Now contributor Vermont Public Radio, takes us to a competition that brought young jumpers to Lebanon, New Hampshire.

  • Read more via Vermont Public Radio

Reporter

  • Charlotte Albright, reporter for Vermont Public Radio. She tweets @VPRAlbright.
